=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Reduce Persistent Systems; target of Rs 3700: Emkay Global Financial
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 07:56
Related Stocks: RELIANCE
Categories: general

Summary:
Emkay Global Financial recommended reduce rating on Persistent Systems with a target price of Rs 3700 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

Sentiment: neutral
